Class Network

java.lang.Object
Network
public class Network extends Object
This class is the driver class of the project. Here we create the whole neural network and implement the back propagation algorithm.
Author:
Michail - Panagiotis Bofos

  • Constructor Details

    • Network

      public Network()

  • Method Details

    • calculateInput

      public static double calculateInput​(Neuron x, ArrayList<Connection> layer)
      This function calculates the input generated by the scalar product of the inputs and the weights. We only need the target neuron (the neuron of whom we want to calculate the input) and the incoming layer connections.
      Parameters:
      x - Neuron The neuron of whom we want to calculate the input
      layer - ArrayList(Connection) the list of connection coming in to x neuron
      Returns:
      Double the calculated input

    • initNetwork

      public static void initNetwork()
      This function is mandatory to the initialization of the neural network. For input layer and each of the hidden ones we add an extra neuron called the bias neuron. The bias neuron has no input connections and has an input value of one.

    • printNetwork

      public static void printNetwork()
      This function prints every neuron in the network.

    • step

      public static void step​(Neuron[] A, ArrayList<Connection> x)
      This function emulates one step of the algorithm.(Basically the input changes which generate in the forward passing of the algorithm.
      Parameters:
      A - Neuron array the input neurons
      x - ArrayList(Connection) the connection of each steps layer

    • connectAll

      public static void connectAll()
      This function creates the topology of the network. Each layer one neuron is connected to each layer two neuron (EXCEPT BIAS NEURONS AS PREVIOUSLY STATED). Each weight is initialized to a random value.

    • printStats

      public static void printStats()
      This function prints the details of each neuron.

    • spreadDelta

      public static void spreadDelta​(int i)
      This function emulates the passage and calculation of the deltas.
      Parameters:
      i - Integer line of train/test data

    • changeWeights

      public static void changeWeights()
      This function emulates the change of the weights using deltas.

    • handleParameters

      public static void handleParameters​(ArrayList<String> list)
      This function selects the parameters given by the input file.
      Parameters:
      list - ArrayList(String) all the parameters

    • printArguments

      public static void printArguments()
      This function prints a table of the arguments.

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Main function
      Parameters:
      args - parameters file (.txt)
